boardgame.name: The Kechibi Code
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

WHAT WILL YOU DO?
The power to shake cities, nations, even corporations is out there, contained in a compact code. What would you do if you could control it? Wield it? Or destroy it? Where would you direct the power? Who would you save, and who would you doom?

Shadowrunners are used to reacting and surviving. The larger choices, things like the flow of billions of nuyen, or shifts in the highest levels of power, are usually out of their grasp.

But not this time. What will you do if you finally manage to grab it?

boardgame.name: We Sold Our Souls to Santa
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Twas the night before Christmas, and we're in a bad mood,
We were naughty this year, and we know we're all screwed.
So what is a group of 4th-graders to do?
Summon ourselves a demon, or two.
Out comes the ouija board, plopped down with a shake.
When we suffered a horrible horrible spelling mistake.
The king of demons we meant to bring,
But dyslexia is a horrible deplorable thing.
So instead of Satan, a Santa called to,
No idea what we children can do.
So heed our advice, before all is a wreck,
When summoning demons, perform a spell check...

Our hapless 4th-grade heroes find themselves on the naughty list and attempt to summon the devil himself to fix their Christmas woes. But when the spell goes horribly awry, it's a tale not of sleighing but of slaying as they find themselves trapped by an Eldritch Santabomination. Will they get a Merry Christmas, or will they meet up with Santa Claws? Find out in... We Sold Our Souls to Santa, a Holiday One Shot from Atomic Ninja Studios.

boardgame.name: Starships and Spacecraft Collection
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

This contains all the ship designs from Starships and Spacecraft volumes 1 - 7

There are over 50 ships and 7 new hull types in total for use with Stars Without Number the Revised Edition.

There is a huge variety of ship types from small shuttles to giant carriers as well as some pre collapse designs.

boardgame.name: Dungeon Design Dash #1: Asymmetric Monastery of the Deranged Berserkers
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Dan and Pau. the Wandering DMs, set themselves up with the challenge of stocking an entire dungeon in under two hours on their weekly live stream. What you see here is the output - a one page dungeon style adventure through an ancient monestary that has been long neglected and ravaged by nature. It features a sentient extraplanar ooze and a group of deranged warriors who worship it as their slimy overlord!

This product was made freely available to all patrons of the Wandering DMs, and is also available here for individual purchase. You can watch Dan and Paul create this very product live on their YouTube channel, Wandering DMs, in Season 03 Episodes 34 and 36. And while you're there why not enjoy one of the many other episodes featuring thoughtful discussion on D&D and other TTRPG related topics, as well as interviews with various luminaries of the RPG space. Or watch one of their many actual play episodes of old school D&D, Warhammer, and more.

boardgame.name: Boudreaux's Old Cabin
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

BOUDREAUX’S CABIN, an adventure that ties the world of Blood & Justice with the greater Omniverse—Evil Beagle’s multiverse of interconnected worlds. Old Boudreaux built a mysterious cabin deep in the swamps, and then vanished from the face of the earth. What horror did he hide within this forbidding shack, and are the heroes courageous enough to face it down?

boardgame.name: The Martial Cult of Blood Knight Gaius
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

THE MARTIAL CULT OF BLOOD KNIGHT GAIUS is a 20-page dungeon crawl about a religious order of vampires who deny their feeding urges, instead only drinking the blood of those whom they have given a formal chance to defend themselves.

The spells, items. and monsters described in this zine are intended for use with Ben Milton’s Knave, but can also be quickly converted for use with B/X or other OSR derivatives. In this zine, you'll find:

NINE MONSTERS AND NPCS: Encounter feral and ravenous Mad Vampires, cyclopean Mountain Screamers, dashing and flamboyant Vampire Knights, a foolhardy adventurer called Sycorax, the craven and backstabbing Demon Priest Morpho, and more!

TWO HARD-HITTING BOSSES: Compete in a duel for a fabulous reward with the brooding cult leader Blood Knight Gaius, and encounter his bodyguard and trusted companion, the mysterious giant First Disciple Matsunaga.

EIGHT SPELLBOOKS AND ENCHANTED ITEMS: Steal Matsunaga's limb-cleaving claymore, wear the Blood Knight's cloak of stars, and gain crystal-control over the Demon Priest Morpho. Read from the spell tomes of the Monastery and learn to summon a full moon, turn the floor into a sea of fire, become a classic movie vampire, and forge a blade from your own blood!

EVEN MORE OSR GOODNESS: Build tension with a rumors table about Matsunaga, set the mood with passages of prose to read to your players, flesh out the story with four reasons to visit the Cult and three possible Epilogues, map out the Monastery courtesy of watabou, and gaze upon three full-page illustrations by yours truly!

While the tone of the adventure is meant to be pulpy and spooky, prominent themes include religion, starvation, shame, blood, and slight body horror. Please confirm that each of your players are comfortable with these themes before you play!

boardgame.name: The Complete Illustrated Book of Abjuration
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Complete Illustrated Book of Abjuration. All Abjuration 5e spells, beautifully illustrated.

boardgame.name: Casus Belli (v4, Issue 37 - May/Jun 2021)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Dans ce numéro 37 de Casus Belli, vous trouverez :

l'actualité des jeux de rôle,
les critiques (Terres d'Arran, Alien, le jeu de rôle, Le Cabinet des murmures, Les Partisans, Les Chants de Loss, L'Attaque de l'Essaim, Gazette Rôle'n Play, PF2 Decks de cartes, Les Encagés, etc.)
les scénarios (Shadowrun 6, Alien, Laelith)
l'adaptation en 5E du comics de dark fantasy horrifique Le Dernier des Dieux (setting, magie, créatures et création de perso)
les aides de jeu (Jeu complet - The Blues Brotherhood, Bâtisses & Artifices : La Colonie Custer Pride, Mythic Battles Pantheon, les PJ et MJ Only...)
les articles rétro (Marvel Super-Heroes, Villains & Vigilantes)
la zone magazine (des entretiens avec Nicolas Jarry et Anne Vétillard, sans oublier le billet de l'odieux connard...)
et bien sûr nos BD : le Club Casus, Donjon Service, etc.

boardgame.name: Casus Belli (v4, Issue 38 - Sep/Oct 2021)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

En quelques mots : Casus Belli continue sa marche en avant ! Il est désormais disponible en boutique de jeux spécialisées dans un format "mook" (à mi-chemin entre le livre et le magazine).
Dans ce numéro 38 de Casus Belli, vous trouverez :

l'actualité des jeux de rôle,
les critiques
les scénarios
les aides de jeu
les articles rétro
la zone magazine
et bien sûr nos BD

boardgame.name: ¡Yo No Tomo!
boardgame.description:
¡Yo No Tomo! (I do not drink!) is a hilarious card game that appeals to competitiveness and is designed for meetings with friends where drinks and the desire to have a good time are present.

The game challenges each team to get all the cards in their BAR before another does or before they have had enough to give up. In the attempt, each team must defend themselves with the cards they have in their possession to avoid getting drunk, while at the same time they can attack their opponents with cards that make them drink. This game is designed and optimized to be played in teams, but its optional individual version also works very well and is just as fun.

¡Yo No Tomo! is just as fun and competitive without alcohol, and for this it is recommended to draw the TRAGO cards.

boardgame.name: Owlbear Nest (Remastered)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Monstrous Lair: Owlbear Nest provides you—the busy, time crunched GM—with the details to effortlessly bring to life the owlbear nests in your campaign. Are you a busy GM? Does session prep take too long? Do you never have time to work on the cool little details that can bring your adventures, dungeons and campaign to life? This short, focused compilation gives you, the time-crunched GM, the tools to effortlessly add verisimilitude and detail to your dungeons. Use the material herein either before or during play and bask in your players' adulation.

boardgame.name: Iwapelé
boardgame.description:
Iwapelé is a set collection and pattern recognition game of African masks.

In their turn, players pick and discard a card, and make sets of 3, 4 or 5 cards, of the same community membership and geometric pattern, receiving points for each set.

The game ends at the fifth round or when a player reaches 500 points.

boardgame.name: Elefant, Tiger & Co. Das Zoo-Spiel zur Serie
boardgame.description: The 5 zoo area cards are laid out, the animal cards are added, all other cards are stacked face down, each player has 7 cards. Whoever's turn it is rolls the dice and moves the game piece, then he can lay or discard cards and draw new ones. Whoever completes a row with food, baby animals, scales with the animal keeper or regardless of cards laid with the veterinarian takes the row for victory points. When all the animals in an area are cleared, the player who has collected the most cards wins.

boardgame.name: オルカコール (Orcas' Call)
boardgame.description:
オルカコール (Orcas' Call) is a 2 player Japanese co-operative communication game. The players are orcas looking for a romantic relationship. But each Orca has a different personality, and they cannot use words. So they convey their feelings using sounds (calling cards).

Both players try to control their scoring on two feelings; crush and comfort. Each player will choose a calling card in secret and show it, and then match them an emotion card. The way the different calls relate, and how they are effected by emotions, make their feelings rise and fall.

As the players get to know each other, unexpected things can happen. The important thing is to keep their feelings together. Will they be united by a love deeper than the sea?

届けたい、この想い。2人専用協力コミュニケーションゲーム！
『Orcas' Call』は、2人専用・協力型のお見合い風カードゲームです。

それぞれ違う性格のシャチとなり、お互いに求愛をして恋仲になることを目指します。
ただし、シャチは言葉を持たなので、コールカード（シャチの発する音波）で想いを伝え合います。
カードの組み合わせによって上下する「ときめき」と「やすらぎ」の２つの気持ちをコントロールしながら、お互いの仲を深めましょう。
時には思いもよらないハプニングも発生するかもしれません。

大事なのはしっかりと想いを合わせること。
あなたたちは海よりも深い愛で結ばれることができるでしょうか？
publisher's summary

boardgame.name: Oltréé: Morts & Vivants
Oltréé: Undead & Alive
boardgame.description:
Oltréé is a cooperative and narrative game where each scenario, called Chronicle, offers a rich and unique setting, with its atmosphere, unique plot, challenges, friends and foes! Each turn will confront you with hard choices, forcing you to manage your actions carefully to fulfill your quest!

In the satrapy, death has never been as final as one would like… Walking corpses, ravenous scavengers, minions of small dark gods, get ready for chilling encounters!
In their frightening adventures, the Rangers fight against the Languor, a morbid melancholy that seizes hearts and souls!

This first expansion contains:

3 new Chronicles (1 short, 2 long, 36 cards total) confronting you with the shadow forces of the undead.
6 new Mission Assignments, with a terrifying new Incident pack called "Death Abounds" (20 cards)
The new Languor mechanic offering a thematic challenge (15 Languor cards)
14 miscellaneous tokens


— description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Let's Play! Oink Games
boardgame.description:
Selling over 1,000,000 copies worldwide, the continually growing game maker, Oink Games, has brought their works to the Nintendo Switch! Enjoy playing these board games a new way, with friends or family, in any situation. Either online or offline, Let's Play!

●Deep Sea Adventure

Winner of the 1st Game Market Grand Prize! A group of adventurers got together on a submarine to try and gather the treasures that sleep at the bottom of the sea. Everyone's all geared up in their diver suits, but riding in a very old submarine means sharing the same oxygen tank. If one of them dives too deep, the other divers' lives will be on the line! Will the adventurers be able to make it back to the submarine safely?!

●A fake artist goes to NY

Drawing meets social deduction! Everyone is drawing a picture together...but someone doesn't know what they are drawing. There is a fake artist hiding among the real artists - can you find out who it is? However, don't let the fake artist figure out what they are supposed to be drawing. Try not to be suspected as the fake artist, but also be careful not to make it too easy for the fake artist to figure out the drawing!

●Startups

Six companies will change the world! You are one of the investors who saw their potential. Invest like crazy and make some money! Only one investor can earn a profit from each company. You must try to read the movements your rivals while using your capital and three cards if you hope to become the biggest shareholder! Not only do you have to be lucky in this game, but you must also analyze your rivals while thinking about your own moves!

●Moon Adventure

You are trapped on the moon due to a massive magnetic storm originating from the sun and all of your supplies from earth have been scattered across the surface.

You and your fellow astronauts are desperately trying to recover the scattered supplies, all while your oxygen levels are falling.

Moon Adventure is a cooperative board game where everyone must work together to complete the mission.

Trust in your wits and your friends to make it back alive!

Source: The Game Website.
boardgame.videogamebg: A Fake Artist Goes to New York

boardgame.name: Oriflamme: Alliance
boardgame.description:
Players use their characters and schemes to secure their claim to the throne. After 6 rounds of play, the player whose family has accumulated the most Influence points wins the game.

The emergence of a neighbouring kingdom destabilizes the great families of the realm and forces them to reconsider their feuds in favour of more political alliances. Yet under the mask of cooperation, ambition still burns and violence will resurface at the first betrayal…

A third stand-alone episode to beautifully conclude the Oriflamme saga. The game introduces 10 innovative effects offering subtle tactical options and rich political decisions. This opus invites to understand the dynamics around the table and to seek a balance between balance between aggression and negotiation! The Empress will reward you but will grant a favour to a rival. The Diplomat will give you the opportunity to forge an alliance with other players. Yet violence is still ready resurface at any moment: the Insurrection will eliminate the two adjacent cards provided you discard a point accumulated on it!

Oriflamme: Alliance offers 10 new action cards that can be mixed with Oriflamme and/or Oriflamme: Ablaze or be used as a standalone.

Contains:

50 Influence cards (10 in 5 different colors)
5 player help cards
63 Influence point tokens (value 1 and 5)
5 Accusation tokens
1 First Player tile
1 Resolution Direction tile

boardgame.name: Regenerate!
boardgame.description:
Regenerate! is a collaborative resource management game that teaches players about regenerative land management, sustainable development, and systems thinking.

The game is played over 20 Rounds during which teams design and deploy Projects that allow them to gain resources (Water, Energy, Food, and Capital) and score points with the Community. All resources must be managed efficiently and Community Score is used to assess the team’s performance at the end of the game.

Maintain regenerative conditions at Fly Ranch as you strategically develop the land, engage with the community, and manage natural and anthropogenic disturbances.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Terror en la Noche
boardgame.description: An old suspense and horror game for kids and adults.

boardgame.name: J'y Crois Pas: Supplément Salades
boardgame.description:
In each round of Fake That! , the player in the role of "Gullible" will ask a wacky question. Each of the other players must answer either the crazy truth or...a big fat lie! Will the liars prove convincing enough? Will Gullible succeed in uncovering all of them without pointing out the right answer?

J'y Crois Pas: Supplément Salade is an expansion containing hundred new questions to renew and extend the discoveries.
It requires the base game.

boardgame.name: Technocracy Reloaded Jumpstart
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Welcome to the Technocratic Union

The Technocracy Reloaded Jumpstart contains everything you need to tell a story of Enlightened Scientists in the world of Mage: The Ascension: 20th Anniversary Edition.

This book contains a condensed but complete ruleset, a primer on Enlightened Science and the Paradox a Technocrat risks when pushing the boundaries of consensus too far, as well as an introductory tale centered around a group of Technocratic agents starting a new assignment in a troubled Illinois Construct.

The Technocracy Reloaded Jumpstart includes:

An overview of the Technocratic Union in Mage: The Ascension 20th Anniversary Edition
All the rules the Storyteller will need to run a Technocracy Reloaded game
A complete story: Welcome to the Rock
Six ready-made characters so you can start playing Technocracy Reloaded right away

boardgame.name: El Juego de la Riqueza
boardgame.description: International financial and commercial strategy.

boardgame.name: Ascendant
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Ascendant is the superpowered role-playing game of infinite possibilities. In this 496-page standalone rulebook, you get:

Elegant game mechanics that swiftly simulate the physics of a comic-book world using easy-to-reference real-life benchmarks
Color-coded challenge action resolution tables that resolve complex actions with superspeed
Infinitely scalable system lets you play heroes of any power level, from streetfighters to living gods – and replicate virtually any character from your favorite anime, comic, manga, or movie settings
Countless powers all customizable with an easy-to-use system of modifier tags that lets you match your power’s specifics to your character concept
Comprehensive detective mechanics for investigating crimes, interviewing witnesses, and finding clues
Detailed options for super-geniuses to create inventions, cure diseases, and even bring their outlandish devices into mass production
Extensive rules for responding to emergencies such as asteroid strikes, avalanches, disease outbreaks, earthquakes, fires, nuclear disasters, tornados, tsunamis, and volcanoes
A huge catalog of pre-built characters and objects including major military vehicles such as aircraft carriers, attack submarines, and ballistic missiles
A dynamic mission generation system to help you create challenges for your heroes
An optional campaign setting with ready-to-use heroes, villains, and organizations


Who will you become when you ascend? Don your cape and mask and find out in Ascendant.

boardgame.name: Doblejuego: Grand Pursang & Zodíaco
boardgame.description:
A collection of 2 family games:

Grand Pursang

Spectacular horse race with a minimum of 3 players and a maximum of 6. Before starting, the participants will decide how many races they will run per game. Each one receives an initial sum of money, with their objective being to obtain the highest capital at the end of the game. Each player, once received and studied his cards, bets on the horse that he considers can win, this choice is secret and is kept in reserve until the end of the race. Then, according to his card playing skills, his audacity and his luck with the dice, he will try to get his favorite horse to cross the finish line in 1st or 2nd place.

Zodíaco

Original, easy and exciting betting game where, starting from an initial sum that each player receives at the beginning of the game, the objective of each one is to conquer the greatest fortune. From 2 to 6 players participate and it is played without a time limit since only the luck of each one will determine the permanence of it. Let's try Zodiac and good luck!

boardgame.name: Krev a Písek
boardgame.description:
In Krev a Písek (Blood and Sand), players are gladiators who are trying to come out on top in the arena.

Each player starts the round with a hand of cards, and everyone secretly chooses and reveals a single card to serve as their starting attack value. In turn, each player plays a card to add to their attack, repel an opponent's attack with a defense card, or modify an attack or prevent a defense; alternatively, a player can pass to skip one turn. If all players are out of cards or pass in turn, the round ends, and whoever has the highest attack value wins. If, however, a player would increase their attack value to 5, they win the round immediately.

The round's winner receives Roman denarii, and whoever first collects 5 Roman denarii wins.

boardgame.name: Florist
boardgame.description:
Your goal in Florist is to create bouquets of three flowers as whoever first creates five bouquets wins.

To set up, shuffle the twenty flower cards, deal four to each player, then lay out the remaining twelve cards in a row. Each player places their florist card next to one of the six cards in the middle of the row, then the game begins.

On a turn, play a card from your hand to move your florist in the market, then pick up the card adjacent to where you moved and leave the played card in its place. If you now have a bouquet in hand — three cards of the same value or type or three cards in a straight — score a bouquet by revealing one flower on your scoring card, then replace the three cards in the bouquet with the three cards at one end of the flower market.

If your florist lands on the same space as the opponent in the market, reveal all cards in your hand to see who has the higher value and wins a point — except that you don't count cards that match the revealed symbols on your opponent's scoring card.

boardgame.name: Deiland: Pocket Planet
boardgame.description:
Deiland: Pocket Planet Edition is a relaxing farming adventure where you will have to take care of your tiny planet.
Discover the story of Arco in this single-player experience, a tale about growing up, helping others and revealing the secrets that lie on the heart of your planet. We’ve crafted a relaxing game, with a strong narrative and a cast of diverse characters for you to meet.

Customize your planet with trees, plants, crops, flowers or structures, and take care of your farm animals. Play and relax. Smooth and cute graphics as well as relaxing soundtrack to ease up the bustling everyday routine.

Source: The Developer Website.

boardgame.name: Wild Assent: Lavon Rising
boardgame.description:
Wild Assent is a 1-4 player miniatures board game with solo, player-versus-player and cooperative modes. Battle your opponents in the gladiatorial arenas of the Silvestrem in Wild Assent’s skirmish mode. Hunt the dangerous creatures of the Wilds, by yourself or with friends, fighting not just for survival, but to keep your expedition running. Regardless of the mode you choose, Wild Assent offers strategic and varied combat, ensuring no two battles are the same.

Wild Assent: Lavon Rising is a reprint campaign for Wild Assent, the questionably named and overly- ambitious board game from Lazy Squire Games. We’ve learned a lot since we first started making the game, in terms of design as well as manufacturing and fulfillment. We’re taking that hard-earned knowledge and putting it back into Wild Assent, to make a great game even better.

boardgame.name: Wild Assent: Daughters of Draketh
boardgame.description: The Daughters of Draketh adds a new narrative-based campaign to Wild Assent. War is brewing in the Wilds and the key to peace rests in the hands of the Daughters of Draketh, a secluded tribe of ashcarii dragon riders. Choose a side and adventure deeper into the Wilds than ever before, battling (or fighting alongside) new creatures and mercenaries. This product will ship with Wave 2. Requires the Wild Assent Core Game only.

boardgame.name: Wild Assent: Waterways of the Wilds
boardgame.description: Waterways of the Wilds adds 28 new miniatures, including the massive XL Slithering Devourer and two new Assents/Seekers. It also adds a new double-sided gameboard with two different maps, each with their own terrain with unique effects. As per usual, there will be new scout cards, creature and wild creature cards, etc so the miniatures can be used in both the Hunt and Arena modes as well as new equipment pulled from the depths below. Wild Assent core game required.

boardgame.name: Guerra de Tronos
boardgame.description:
Guerra de Tronos is a war and strategic board game set in the Game of Thrones universe.

The game develops a war conflict that takes place on the continents of Westeros and Essos, divided into 54 territories. Each faction has a goal to meet, and to do so, they must expand domains, attack and defend against adversaries, mobilize armies and establish alliances.

In Westeros, the death of King Robert has created a power vacuum, and the Lannisters, Baratheon and Stark compete for the Iron Throne.

Meanwhile, in Essos, Daenerys Targaryen attempts to dominate Slave Bay and cross the Narrow Sea. The Free Cities seek to consolidate their independence, and the Wildlings cross to the south of the Wall fleeing death ...
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Books: A Song of Ice and Fire
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: T.E.G.: Plan Táctico y Estratégico de la Guerra

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Sherwood
boardgame.description:
Sherwood is an introduction to medieval skirmish games like Cry Havoc or Guiscard. It takes up the well-known theme of Robin Hood and simulates clashes between Robin and his Merry Men against the henchmen of the Sheriff of Nottingham.

Each counter is unique and depicts a specific character in different stances, from healthy to wounded, stunned and finally dead.

4 maps can be assembled in multiple ways to create varied terrains.

Sherwood simplifies the rules of the other games in the series to be accessible to younger kids and the scenarios will be simple enough to be played in one hour for maximum playability and fun.

—description from the designer
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Folk Tales & Fairy Tales: Robin Hood

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: UNO: All Wild!
boardgame.description:
UNO All Wild plays just like traditional UNO except every card is wild. That means instead of having to matching color and number, you can play any card you want. The goal is the same: be the first player to get rid of all your cards. But it gets complicated thanks to the addition of new action cards that let players strategize and make sure no one goes out too soon.

—description from the designer

listing.notes: Title: UNO: All Wild! Publisher: Mattel Language(s): English German French Spanish Italian

boardgame.name: Borderlands: Mister Torgue's Arena of Badassery – Borderlands Object Pack
boardgame.description:
The Borderlands Object Pack brings you unique 3D models to spice up your arena even further as you battle through the arena looting and murdering.

Contains:
- 2 outhouse miniatures
- 3 New-U Station miniatures
- 4 loot chest miniatures
- 4 mailbox miniatures
- 6 ammo chest miniatures

– description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Borderlands: Mister Torgue's Arena of Badassery

boardgame.name: Borderlands: Mister Torgue's Arena of Badassery – Best Minion Ever
boardgame.description:
Defeat Captain Flynt and expand your collection of bandits with the Best Minion Ever bounty pack

Contains:

Captain Flynt miniature
4 Nomad miniatures
4 Bruiser miniatures
all game cards needed to play


—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Borderlands: Mister Torgue's Arena of Badassery
